page.title: 10LAW AND ORDER
page.content:
IN Malpas there is one police station At the police station there is one police sergeant and four constables. Our community police constable is call ed David Evans. Each policeman works eight hours each day, but they are on call 24 hours every day if they are needed. The head quarters for the police is at CHESTER where they have to report to each day. The sort of work that the police are involved in is: seeing to accidents, investigating any crimes that are committed. If they need extra help they can radio for assistance and extra police constables will arrive from Farndon, Tattenhall or Chester.
More information on page 11.
